title: SAP CEO Bill McDermott Steps Down
text:
By Josh Beckerman

SAP SE (SAP) said Chief Executive Bill McDermott will step down, and said executive board members Jennifer Morgan and Christian Klein have been named co-CEOs, effective immediately.

Mr. McDermott will remain in an advisory capacity until the end of the year.

The company also reported preliminary third-quarter results, including 13% revenue growth, calling its results "outstanding."

Write to Josh Beckerman at josh.beckerman@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 10, 2019 19:11 ET (23:11 GMT)
